effects: Physical damage (2x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce DEF by 40% for 3 turns to one enemy
Inflict Stop (50%) for one turn on one enemy

Gain access to following skills:
	Accel Shot (502540)
	Lightning Pierce (502560)
name: Lightning Pierce
Lightning Pierce
雷霆耳環
라이트닝 피어스
Anneaux de foudre
Blitzstechen
Perforación relámpago
desc_short: Damage, reduce DEF, and chance of confusing and stopping one enemy
攻擊1名敵人+降低防禦的數值+一定機率施加混亂停止效果
적 1명에게 피해+방어력 감소+일정 확률로 혼란과 스톱 부여
Dégâts, réduit la DEF et chance de rendre confus et de stopper un ennemi
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und verringert ABW, Chance, ihn zu verwirren und zu stoppen.
Daña, reduce DEF y puede confundir o parar a un enemigo
desc_long: Deals damage to one enemy, reduces their DEF, and adds a chance of confusing and stopping them.
攻擊1名敵人，並降低其防禦的數值，一定機率施加混亂停止效果。
적 1명에게 피해를 주고, 방어력을 감소시키며, 일정 확률로 혼란과 스톱을 부여합니다.
Dégâts, réduit la DEF et chance de rendre confus et de stopper un ennemi
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und verringert ABW, Chance, ihn zu verwirren und zu stoppen.
Inflige daño a un enemigo, reduce su DEF y puede confundirlo o pararlo.
